title: An Act relative to firearms features

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Thurber of Somerset, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2715) of Justin Thurber and John R. Gaskey relative to assault-style firearms.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security
